long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Grateful Me: Your Daily Mindfulness Companion 🌟

Cultivate positivity and mental well-being with Grateful Me, a simple yet powerful gratitude journaling Chrome extension designed to help you focus on the good in your life.

✨ Key Features:
- 📝 Quick Daily Journaling: Capture your thoughts in under 100 words
- 🌈 Mood Tracking: Select your daily emotional state with expressive emojis
- 🕰️ Customizable Daily Reminders: Set a time that works best for you
- 📊 Streak Tracking: Monitor your journaling consistency
- 🔒 Private & Secure: All entries stored locally in your browser

🧘 How It Works:
1. Click the heart icon to open the extension
2. Choose your mood
3. Write what you're grateful for today
4. Save and watch your positivity grow!

💡 Benefits:
- Reduce stress and anxiety
- Improve mental health and outlook
- Build a habit of gratitude and self-reflection
- No internet connection required
- Completely free and lightweight

Perfect for:
- Mindfulness practitioners
- Mental health advocates
- Anyone seeking personal growth
- Students and professionals

Start your gratitude journey today – one entry at a time! 🌱❤️
